nodes.text: The Bitmus Cloud was an area through which the San Tekka clan of hyperspace prospectors mapped valuable new routes after the Hyperspace Rush using the talents of the hyperspace savant Mari San Tekka, who mapped similar route through the Relgim Run. Over one hundred years later, the scientist Chancey Yarrow mentioned the Bitmus Cloud when explaining San Tekka's abilities to Nan, a member of the Nihil, in around 231 BBY.
The Bitmus Cloud was first mentioned in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Out of the Shadows, which was written by Justina Ireland.
